full_summary:
### Tender Notice
**Chancery Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada to Ireland**

***Summary***

The Embassy of Canada to Ireland in Dublin is seeking a service provider for Chancery Cleaning Services. The selected vendor will be responsible for cleaning and maintaining a multi-use facility with approximately 670 m² of space, housed on the 3rd floor. This tender includes all necessary contracts as per CAN supplies.

***Tender Details***

| Field | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number (Numéro de référence) | CB-134-77262448 |
| Amendment Number (Numéro de modification) | 4 |
| Solicitation Number (Numéro de sollicitation) | 24-245690 |
| Publication Date (Date de publication) | 2023-11-03 |
| Tender Closing Date (Date de clôture des appels d'offres) | 2023-12-05T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date (Date de modification) | 2023-12-05 |
| Tender Status (Statut des appels d'offres) | Expired |
| Procurement Category (Catégorie de l'approvisionnement) | SRV |
| Notice Type (Type d'avis) | Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions) |

***Scope of Work***

The contract includes cleaning services for a mixed-use Embassy facility with 670 m² of space, with a total of 18 staff members. The space includes offices, meeting rooms, storage rooms, restrooms, and a kitchen.

***Attachment***

* [Tender Document (Document de l'appel d'offres)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23909/24-245690---chancery-cleaning-services-for-the-embassy-of-canada-to-ireland%2C-in-dublin---rfp_0.pdf)
